metadata.title: CVE-2023-35128 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the fstReaderIterBlocks2time_table tsec_nitems functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .fst file can lead to memory corruption. A victim would need toopen a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
